props.name: required
props.description: Indicates to the user and assistive technologies that the field value is required

props.name: cols
props.description: Specifies the visible width of a text area.

props.name: rows
props.description: Specifies the visible height of a text area.

props.name: block
props.description: Expands with width of the component to fill the parent elements

props.name: validationStatus
props.description: Style the textarea to match the current form validation status
